rampage-slash.name: Rampage Slash
rampage-slash.description: Deals extreme physical Slash damage to one enemy. Ignores resistances.

wild-bore.name: Wild Bore
wild-bore.description: Deals extreme physical Pierce damage to one enemy. Significantly decreases their Attack for 3 turns.

wanton-destruction.name: Wanton Destruction
wanton-destruction.description: Deals extreme physical Strike damage to one enemy. Inflicts a one-time weakness to Strike.

battlecry-tackle.name: Battlecry Tackle
battlecry-tackle.description: Deals heavy physical Strike damage to all enemies 1-3 times. Ignores resistances.

meteoric-fist.name: Meteoric Fist
meteoric-fist.description: Deals weak physical Strike damage to all enemies 1-3 times.

energy-ray.name: Energy Ray
energy-ray.description: Deals heavy physical Light damage to one enemy. Power proportional to caster's remaining HP.

wild-barrage.name: Wild Barrage
wild-barrage.description: Only usable from back row. Deals medium physical Pierce damage to all enemies 2-3 times

masukujaja.name: Masukujaja (Synthesis)
masukujaja.description: Increases all allies' Hit/Evasion for 3 turns.

mania-bullet.name: Mania Bullet
mania-bullet.description: Only usable from back row. Heavy phys. Pierce damage to one enemy. Inflicts 1-time weakness to Slash/Pierce/Strike.

mahama.name: Mahama
mahama.description: Deals weak magic Light damage to all enemies. Requires Hama.

medica.name: Medica
medica.description: Medium HP recovery for all allies. Requires Medi.

magical-injection.name: Magical Injection
magical-injection.description: Raises a barrier that nullifies one attack that would inflict a status ailment. Affects all allies.

jump-thrust.name: Jump Thrust
jump-thrust.description: Deals medium physical Pierce damage to one enemy. Lowers their Defence for 3 turns.

protect-guard.name: Protect Guard (Synthesis)
protect-guard.description: Raises a barrier that nullifies one Slash/Pierce/Strike attack for one ally.

magic-guard.name: Magic Guard
magic-guard.description: Raises a barrier that nullifies one elemental attack for all allies in caster's row.

hammer-of-justice.name: Hammer of Justice
hammer-of-justice.description: Deals heavy physical Pierce damage to one enemy. Inflicts a one-time weakness to Pierce.

gabot.name: Gabot
gabot.description: Deals weak magic Fire damage to all enemies. Requires Bot.

botra.name: Botra
botra.description: Deals medium Fire damage to all enemies. Requires Bot.
botra.party-requirement: Mage, Masked Dancer, or Summoner Lineages

gablizz.name: Gablizz
gablizz.description: Deals weak magic Ice damage to all enemies. Requires Blizz.

blizza.name: Blizza
blizza.description: Deals medium magic Ice damage to one enemy. Requires Blizz.
blizza.party-requirement: Mage, Masked Dancer, or Summoner Lineages

gakande.name: Gakande
gakande.description: Deals weak magic Electric damage to all enemies. Requires Kande.

kandera.name: Kandera
kandera.description: Deals medium magic Electric damage to one enemy. Requires Kande.
kandera.party-requirement: Mage, Masked Dancer, or Summoner Lineages

meteophor.name: Meteophor
meteophor.description: Deals severe magic Fire damage to one enemy.
meteophor.party-requirement: Seeker, Mage, or Healer Lineages AND Mage, Masked Dancer, or Summoner Lineages

hellfire-dance.name: Hellfire Dance
hellfire-dance.description: Inflicts all enemies with a one-time weakness to Fire. Ignores resistances.
hellfire-dance.party-requirement: Mage, Masked Dancer, or Summoner Lineages

ice-blue-dance.name: Ice-Blue Dance
ice-blue-dance.description: Inflicts all enemies with a one-time weakness to Ice. Ignores resistances.

sable-dance.name: Sable Dance
sable-dance.description: Inflicts all enemies with a one-time weakness to Dark. Ignores resistances.
sable-dance.party-requirement: Warrior, Thief, or Masked Dancer Lineages

danse-macabre.name: Danse Macabre
danse-macabre.description: High chance of one-hit killing all enemies.

tetrabreak.name: Tetrabreak
tetrabreak.description: Negates one enemy's Repel Physical skill.

rider-of-the-blade.name: Rider of the Blade
rider-of-the-blade.description: Deals heavy physical Light damage to one enemy.

horse-drawn-carnage.name: Horse-Drawn Carnage
horse-drawn-carnage.description: Deals heavy physical Strike damage to one enemy.

gacyc.name: Gacyc
gacyc.description: Deals weak magic Wind damage to all enemies. Requires Cyc.

matarukaja.name: Matarukaja (Synthesis)
matarukaja.description: Increases all allies' Attack for 3 turns. Requires Tarukaja.

adventurers-curiosity.name: Adventurerer's Curiosity
adventurers-curiosity.description: Increases Critical Rate for all allies for 3 turns.
adventurers-curiosity.party-requirement: Gunner, Masked Dancer, or Beserker Lineages

gacyclo.name: Gacyclo
gacyclo.description: Deals medium Wind damage to all allies. Requires Cyclo.

summon-lizardman.name: Summon Lizardman
summon-lizardman.description: Deals extreme physical Electric damage to one enemy. Lowers their Defence for 3 turns

summon-undead-king.name: Summon Undead King
summon-undead-king.description: Deals severe magic Dark damage to one enemy. May one-hit kill target.

summon-eagle-lion-king.name: Summon Eagle Lion King
summon-eagle-lion-king.description: Deals extreme magic Wind damage to all enemies. Significantly decreases their Attack for 3 turns.

summon-dragon-god.name: Summon Dragon God
summon-dragon-god.description: Deals severe magic Fire damage to all enemies and removes buff effects.
summon-dragon-god.party-requirement: Mage, Masked Dancer, or Summoner Lineages

summon-guptauros-king.name: Summon Guptauros King
summon-guptauros-king.description: Deals medium physical Strike damage to all enemies 1-3 times.

mamudo.name: Mamudo
mamudo.description: Deals weak magic Dark damage to all enemies. Requires Mudo.

phantom-tracer.name: Phantom Tracer
phantom-tracer.description: Deals extreme physical Slash damage to one enemy and removes buff effects.
phantom-tracer.party-requirement: Warrior, Thief, or Masked Dancer Lineages

mamudoon.name: Mamudoon
mamudoon.description: Deals medium magic Dark damage to all enemies. Requires Madoon.

round-slash.name: Round Slash
round-slash.description: Deals weak physical Slash damage to all enemies.

bamboo-splitter.name: Bamboo Splitter
bamboo-splitter.description: Deals heavy physical Slash damage to one enemy. Adds one Turn Icon on a killing blow.

peerless-stonecleaver.name: Peerless Stonecleaver
peerless-stonecleaver.description: Deals severe physical Slash damage to one enemy. Adds one Turn Icon on a killing blow.
peerless-stonecleaver.party-requirement: Warrior, Thief, or Masked Dancer Lineages AND Warrior, Brawler, or Berserker Lineages
